definitions.definition: A figure carved in relief or incised , especially representing a sound , word , or idea .

subdefinitions.definition: Any of various figures used in Mayan writing.

definitions.definition: Any non-verbal symbol that imparts information .
A visual representation of a letter , character , or symbol , in a specific font and style .
examples: The grid column header displays a sort glyph indicating an ascending or descending ordering.

definitions.definition: A land snail of the genus Glyphyalinia
Any of various black-and-white noctuid moths with figural-like wing patterns, such as those in Protodeltote , Deltote , and Maliattha .

main_definition: A figure carved in relief or incised , especially representing a sound , word , or idea .
secondary_definitions: Any non-verbal symbol that imparts information .
( typography , computing ) A visual representation of a letter , character , or symbol , in a specific font and style .
A land snail of the genus Glyphyalinia
Any of various black-and-white noctuid moths with figural-like wing patterns, such as those in Protodeltote , Deltote , and Maliattha .
